metadata.title: W3Schools.com
metadata.Keywords: HTML, Python, CSS, SQL, JavaScript, How to, PHP, Java, C, C++, C#, jQuery, Bootstrap, Colors, W3.CSS, XML, MySQL, Icons, NodeJS, React, Graphics, Angular, R, AI, Git, Data Science, Code Game, Tutorials, Programming, Web Development, Training, Learning, Quiz, Exercises, Courses, Lessons, References, Examples, Learn to code, Source code, Demos, Tips, Website
metadata.Description: Well organized and easy to understand Web building tutorials with lots of examples of how to use HTML, CSS, JavaScript, SQL, PHP, Python, Bootstrap, Java and XML.
metadata.og:description: W3Schools offers free online tutorials, references and exercises in all the major languages of the web. Covering popular subjects like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Python, SQL, Java, and many, many more.

content.text: Cyber Security Syllabus
Introduction
The W3Schools Cyber Security Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.
content.html: The W3Schools Cyber Security Tutorial is comprehensive and beginner-friendly.

content.text: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of cyber security principles and practices.
content.html: It will give you a fundamental knowledge of cyber security principles and practices.

content.text: It is designed for beginners and requires basic computer and networking knowledge.
content.html: It is designed for beginners and requires basic computer and networking knowledge.

content.text: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.
content.html: The content has been carefully made to be bite-sized, simple, and easy to understand.

content.text: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.
content.html: The content has been proven by millions of users over the years. It is updated and improved frequently.

content.text: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn cyber security step by step, from basic concepts to advanced security practices.
content.html: The syllabus outline and its sequence are structured so you can learn cyber security step by step, from basic concepts to advanced security practices.

content.text: Get Started With Cyber Security »
content.html: Get Started With Cyber Security »

content.text: Learning Outcomes

Note: Are you a teacher teaching Cyber Security? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here .
content.html: Note: Are you a teacher teaching Cyber Security? W3Schools Academy is a toolbox of features that can help you teach. It offers classroom features such as pre-built study plans, classroom administration and much more. Read more about Academy here.

content.text: Which Subjects Are Cyber Security Relevant For?

content.html: In this tutorial we offer different activities for you to learn Cyber Security for free:

You can also create a free account to track your progress.
content.html: You can also create a free account to track your progress.

content.text: As a signed-in user, you get access to features such as:
content.html: As a signed-in user, you get access to features such as:

content.text: Overview of the Modules
Get Started
content.html: Get Started

content.text: Sandbox and Lab Environment
Cyber Security, like any technical field, is best learned through hands-on practice.
content.html: Cyber Security, like any technical field, is best learned through hands-on practice.

content.text: If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called Spaces that allows you to practice basic security concepts for free.
content.html: If you want to explore more and host your project, we have a feature called Spaces that allows you to practice basic security concepts for free.

content.text: Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces, where you can practice security techniques and test security tools in real-time.
content.html: Here you get a secure sandbox environment called Spaces, where you can practice security techniques and test security tools in real-time.

content.text: Spaces allow you to test, analyze, and implement security measures. This includes a W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.
content.html: Spaces allow you to test, analyze, and implement security measures. This includes a W3Schools subdomain, hosting, and secure SSL certificates.

content.text: Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.
content.html: Spaces require no installation and run directly in the browser.

content.text: Features include:
content.html: Features include:

content.text: Create a Spaces Account
content.html: Create a Spaces Account

content.text: Cyber Security Certification
W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.
content.html: W3Schools offers an end-of-pathway certification program.

content.text: Here you can take exams to get certified.
content.html: Here you can take exams to get certified.

content.text: The Cyber Security exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools Cyber Security syllabus.
content.html: The Cyber Security exam is a test that summarizes the W3Schools Cyber Security syllabus.

content.text: After passing the exam you get the "Certified Cyber Security Professional" Certification.
content.html: After passing the exam you get the "Certified Cyber Security Professional" Certification.

content.text: There are two different types of certifications:
content.html: There are two different types of certifications:

content.text: The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.
content.html: The non-adaptive is pass or no pass.

content.text: The adaptive certification is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.
content.html: The adaptive certification is adaptive and graded; students will get a grade from intermediate, advanced to professional.

content.text: Buy Certificate »
content.html: Buy Certificate »

content.text: Are You a Teacher?
Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach Cyber Security?
content.html: Are you interested in learning how you can use W3Schools Academy to Teach Cyber Security?

content.text: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy . You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
content.html: Watch a demo of W3Schools Academy. You'll see how it works, and discover how it can make teaching programming easier and more engaging.
